translated: Do not accept Dharma robes and so on from thieves who come to steal. Accept Dharma robes and so on from those who are known in the world to give them.

original: grags par gyur pa las chos gos la sogs pa 'ong ba ni 'jig rten na grags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: grags par gyur pa las chos gos la sogs pa 'ong ba ni 'jig rten na grags pa yin gyi /
translated: Dharma robes and so on coming from those who are known in the world to give them are known in the world.

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not from others.

original: de las blangs pa mtshon gyis bcad pa dang / kha dog ngan par byas te bcang par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las blangs pa mtshon gyis bcad pa dang / kha dog ngan par byas te bcang par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase having taken it, cut it with a knife and wear it after making it ugly means

original: grags pa de las chos gos la sogs pa gang blangs pa gri la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis kha tshar dang phun tshar btogs pa la sogs pa gcad pa dang / kha bsgyur ba la sogs pas kha dog ngan par bya ba de @136b byas te bsrel zhing bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: grags pa de las chos gos la sogs pa gang blangs pa gri la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis kha tshar dang phun tshar btogs pa la sogs pa gcad pa dang / kha bsgyur ba la sogs pas kha dog ngan par bya ba de @136b byas te bsrel zhing bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that whatever Dharma robes, etc. are taken from that place, they should be cut with a knife, etc. and made ugly by dyeing, etc. and then worn.üîΩThis is the meaning of the text.

original: de ltar byas kyang slong na sbyin no zhes bya ba ni mtshon gyis gcad pa dang / kha dog ngan par byas pa de ltar byas kyang sngon bdag po gzhan zhig na re 'di bdag gi rdzas sngon gyi chom rkun par grags pas khyer pa yin pas bdag la byin cig ces slong na dge slong gis sbyin no //
analyzed: de ltar byas kyang slong na sbyin no zhes bya ba ni mtshon gyis gcad pa dang / kha dog ngan par byas pa de ltar byas kyang sngon bdag po gzhan zhig na re 'di bdag gi rdzas sngon gyi chom rkun par grags pas khyer pa yin pas bdag la byin cig ces slong na dge slong gis sbyin no //
translated: If it is requested, give it means that if, even though it has been cut with a knife and made ugly, someone says, This is my property. It was taken by a previous thief, so give it to me, then the monk should give it.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the teaching.

original: de gang las phrogs pa'i bdag po de gal te 'di bdag gi yin no zhes slong na de de la sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de gang las phrogs pa'i bdag po de gal te 'di bdag gi yin no zhes slong na de de la sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If the owner from whom it was stolen demands it, saying, ‚ÄúThis is mine,‚Äù it is the rule that it should be returned to him.

original: gnad la bsgre bar bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir gnad la bsgre bar zhes bya ba ni yon po dang gya gyu'i rnam pas gnod par bya ba la bya ste /
analyzed: gnad la bsgre bar bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir gnad la bsgre bar zhes bya ba ni yon po dang gya gyu'i rnam pas gnod par bya ba la bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not harm him‚Äù means that one should not harm him by crooked or deceitful means.

original: de su la yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de su la yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that one should not harm anyone at all.

original: tshe dang ldan pa spong byed kyis bzod par bya ba'i phyir khyim pa rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la khye'u dang bu mo du ba dag sdud du bcug ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa spong byed kyis bzod par bya ba'i phyir khyim pa rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la khye'u dang bu mo du ba dag sdud du bcug ste /
translated: The venerable P≈´r·πáa gave permission to householders to take the son or daughter of an arhat as a disciple in order to make them patient.

original: gnod par byed pa gang yin la lta bu ste /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa gang yin la lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is said that the householder UpƒÅli took the son of the arhat ƒÄnanda as a disciple and harmed him.

original: de thams cad du sbyar bar bya ba yin par snang bas thams cad kyi dbang du byas so //
analyzed: de thams cad du sbyar bar bya ba yin par snang bas thams cad kyi dbang du byas so //
translated: Since it appears that this should be applied in all cases, it is stated in terms of all.

original: ma byin par len pa la yang 'di sbyar ba yod de /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa la yang 'di sbyar ba yod de /
translated: This should also be applied to stealing.

original: gnad la bsgre bas gtong ba dang sbyin du 'jug pa na brkus par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gnad la bsgre bas gtong ba dang sbyin du 'jug pa na brkus par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: When one gives or causes to give by way of a hint, there is stealing.

original: gsang sngags dag gis gtong ba la nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni /üîΩrdzu 'phrul dang 'dra ba'i yid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: gsang sngags dag gis gtong ba la nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni / rdzu 'phrul dang 'dra ba'i yid rnam par dag pas /
translated: There is no offense when one gives by way of a spell.

original: gzhan gyis phrogs pa'i rdzas gtong bar byed pa la ni nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis phrogs pa'i rdzas gtong bar byed pa la ni nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When one gives by way of a spell, there is no offense.

original: byi pas khyer ba bdag pos blangs pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byi pas khyer ba bdag pos blangs pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By way of a spell, one gives a substance that was stolen by another.üîΩThere is no offense when one takes back what was taken by a thief.

original: dag slong len pa po gang yin pa de'i rdzas byi bas khyer ba phyir blangs pa la yang nyes pa med de /
analyzed: dag slong len pa po gang yin pa de'i rdzas byi bas khyer ba phyir blangs pa la yang nyes pa med de /
translated: When a beggar takes back his own substance, there is no offense.

original: 'di bdag gi yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa des len pa la nyes pa med do //üîΩdge slong gzhan gyi rdzas la de'i rdzas su na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di bdag gi yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa des len pa la nyes pa med do // dge slong gzhan gyi rdzas la de'i rdzas su na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: When one takes it with the thought, ‚ÄúThis is mine,‚Äù there is no offense.üîΩThere is no offense when one takes back the substance of another monk.

original: dge slong gzhan gyi rdzas byi bas khyer bar gyur pa'i rdzas de dge slong gzhan gyis dge slong gzhan gyi rdzas yin gyi /
analyzed: dge slong gzhan gyi rdzas byi bas khyer bar gyur pa'i rdzas de dge slong gzhan gyis dge slong gzhan gyi rdzas yin gyi /
translated: When a monk takes back a substance that was stolen by a thief, that substance belongs to another monk.

original: bdag gi rdzas ni ma yin no zhes de'i rdzas su len par byed pa de la yang nyes pa med de rku sems med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag gi rdzas ni ma yin no zhes de'i rdzas su len par byed pa de la yang nyes pa med de rku sems med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But there is no fault in taking it as his own property, because he has no thought of stealing.

original: rngon pa dag gis mngon par gtses par gyur pa'i ri dags gnas khang du zhugs pa blangs pa la yang ngo zhes bya @137a * //
analyzed: rngon pa dag gis mngon par gtses par gyur pa'i ri dags gnas khang du zhugs pa blangs pa la yang ngo zhes bya @137a * //
translated: Also, when a deer is seized and taken into a house, because it is tormented by hunters.

original: ba ni / gal te rngon pa dag ri dags la 'tshe bar byed cing ri dags de yang gnas khang du 'jug na rngon pa de dag gis mngon par gtses pa'i ri dags gnas khang du zhugs pa bzung zhing blangs pa la nyes pa med de /
analyzed: ba ni / gal te rngon pa dag ri dags la 'tshe bar byed cing ri dags de yang gnas khang du 'jug na rngon pa de dag gis mngon par gtses pa'i ri dags gnas khang du zhugs pa bzung zhing blangs pa la nyes pa med de /
translated: If hunters torment a deer and that deer enters a house, there is no fault in seizing and taking the deer that is tormented by hunters and enters a house,

original: yongs su bskyabs pa'i bsam pas bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su bskyabs pa'i bsam pas bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seized with the intention of protecting it.

original: khyad par de lta bu can gyi ri dags de shi na ji ltar bya zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par de lta bu can gyi ri dags de shi na ji ltar bya zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: What should be done if the deer with such a special nature dies?

original: de shi na de dag la sbyin par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de shi na de dag la sbyin par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore it is said: When it dies, it should be given to them.

original: de dag gis gtses pa'i ri dags der yang zhugs nas shi na shi ba de de dag la sbyin par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gis gtses pa'i ri dags der yang zhugs nas shi na shi ba de de dag la sbyin par bya ba nyid do //
translated: If the deer tormented by them enters there and dies, then that death is to be given to them.

original: de dag rang gis blang ba nyid du mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag rang gis blang ba nyid du mi bya'o //
translated: They should not take it themselves.

original: gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi bya ba nyid do //üîΩma byin par len pa'i pham par 'gyur pa 'dul byed kyi skabs dag go zhes bya ba 'dul byed kyi skabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi bya ba nyid do // ma byin par len pa'i pham par 'gyur pa 'dul byed kyi skabs dag go zhes bya ba 'dul byed kyi skabs rdzogs so //
translated: They should not give it to others.üîΩThe context of the Vinaya master is finished.üîΩThe defeat of taking what is not given is finished.

original: ma byin par len pa'i pham par 'gyur ba rdzogs so zhes bya ba de bshad zin to /üîΩ// / mkhyen par len pa'i pham par 'gyur ba smras nas /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa'i pham par 'gyur ba rdzogs so zhes bya ba de bshad zin to / // / mkhyen par len pa'i pham par 'gyur ba smras nas /
translated: Having spoken of the defeat of taking what is not given,

original: da ni gsor pa'i pham par 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gsor pa'i pham par 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: now the defeat of healing should be stated.

original: de'i phyir nad pa la 'chi ba'i sems pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i nye bar bsgrub pa nye bar bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /üîΩ'chi ba'i phyir sems pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir nad pa la 'chi ba'i sems pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i nye bar bsgrub pa nye bar bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smras te / 'chi ba'i phyir sems pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is said that one should not provide medical treatment that is in accordance with the intention to die for a sick person.üîΩThe intention to die is

original: 'chi ba'i sems pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i sems pa'o //
translated: the intention to die.

original: de dang rjes su mthun pa ni mthun pa'o //
analyzed: de dang rjes su mthun pa ni mthun pa'o //
translated: The corresponding is the concordant.

original: de'i nye bar bsgrub pa ni tshogs pa'i bye brag gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i nye bar bsgrub pa ni tshogs pa'i bye brag gang yin pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment is the particular collection.

original: de nya bar bsgrub par mi bya ba ni nad pa la de bstabs par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nya bar bsgrub par mi bya ba ni nad pa la de bstabs par mi bya ba'o //
translated: The non-accomplishment is the non-accomplishment of that, which is not to be given to the sick.

original: nad pa smos pa ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: nad pa smos pa ni mtshon pa ste /
translated: The mention of the sick is an illustration.

original: mi na ba la yang nye bar bsgrub par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi na ba la yang nye bar bsgrub par mi bya'o //
translated: The non-accomplishment is not to be given to the healthy either.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: nye bar bsgrub pa gang gis nad pa 'chi ba'i bsam ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i nye bar bsgrub par gyur pa /üîΩkhyod du gzos par gyur pa ni bla'i /
analyzed: nye bar bsgrub pa gang gis nad pa 'chi ba'i bsam ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i nye bar bsgrub par gyur pa / khyod du gzos par gyur pa ni bla'i /
translated: The accomplishment that would cause the sick person to think of death,üîΩ it is better to be concerned with that.

original: 'di lta bu'i mi 'phrod pa za bar byed pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nye bar bsgrub par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i mi 'phrod pa za bar byed pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nye bar bsgrub par mi bya ste /
translated: It is not like that for one who eats such unwholesome food.

original: 'di ni bsam pa'i nyes pa med pa'i nyes byas su rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam pa'i nyes pa med pa'i nyes byas su rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is established as a misdeed without the fault of intention.

original: bsam pa'i nyes pa kye ma 'di shi bar gyur cig snyam na ni de'i tshe sbom por rnam par gzhag go //üîΩmi shes pa la 'chi ba'i dgra bo ma smras par /
analyzed: bsam pa'i nyes pa kye ma 'di shi bar gyur cig snyam na ni de'i tshe sbom por rnam par gzhag go // mi shes pa la 'chi ba'i dgra bo ma smras par /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúAlas, may he die,‚Äù then at that time it is established as a serious downfall.

original: de'i nad g-yog tu mi bzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i nad g-yog tu mi bzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not place a nurse at the bedside of a patient who does not know this, without telling him about the enemy, death.üîΩThis means that one should not place a nurse at the bedside of a patient who does not know this, who is ignorant and foolish, without telling him about the enemy, death.

original: @137b nad g-yog mi shes pa glen pa mi shes pa la nad pa 'chi ba'i dgra bo mi 'chi bar bya ba'i thabs 'di skad brjod par bya ba khyod kyis 'di 'chi ba la dgra bos gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: @137b nad g-yog mi shes pa glen pa mi shes pa la nad pa 'chi ba'i dgra bo mi 'chi bar bya ba'i thabs 'di skad brjod par bya ba khyod kyis 'di 'chi ba la dgra bos gnas par bya ste /
translated: One should tell him, ‚ÄúYou should stay with this patient, who is the enemy of death, and not let him die.

original: gal te rang nyid 'chi bar 'dod na khyod kyis yal bar dor bar mi bya'o //üîΩgrogs kyang ma byed cig ces ma smras par nad pa de'i drung du nad g-yog tu mi gzhag go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid 'chi bar 'dod na khyod kyis yal bar dor bar mi bya'o // grogs kyang ma byed cig ces ma smras par nad pa de'i drung du nad g-yog tu mi gzhag go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If he himself wishes to die, you should not abandon him.‚ÄùüîΩOne should not place a nurse at the bedside of a patient without telling him, ‚ÄúDo not be a friend to him.‚Äù

original: gnas yod na mi gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas yod na mi gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not place a nurse at the bedside of a patient without telling him, ‚ÄúDo not be a friend to him.‚Äù

original: gal te gnas gzhan yod de ji ste nad g-yog mdzangs pa gzhag pa'i skabs yod na ni de'i tshe mi shes pa la go bar byas su zin kyang gzhag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: gal te gnas gzhan yod de ji ste nad g-yog mdzangs pa gzhag pa'i skabs yod na ni de'i tshe mi shes pa la go bar byas su zin kyang gzhag par mi bya ste /
translated: If there is a wise attendant, even if he does not understand, he should not be dismissed.

original: mdzangs ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdzangs ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is a wise one.

original: 'chi ba'i 'tshog chas mi gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'tshog chas mi gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not keep the implements of death nearby.

original: 'chi ba'i 'tshog chas mtshon cha la sogs pa nad g-yog gis nad pa'i drung du me gzhag go //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'tshog chas mtshon cha la sogs pa nad g-yog gis nad pa'i drung du me gzhag go //
translated: The attendant should not keep the implements of death, such as weapons, near the patient.

original: 'chi ba'i phyir rjes su sgrub pa las nad g-yog gis bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i phyir rjes su sgrub pa las nad g-yog gis bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If the attendant is following the patient in order to kill him, he should be stopped.

original: nad pa de 'chi ba'i phyir rjes su bsgrub pa dug za ba dang thag pas 'ching ba dang / mtshon 'byin pa la sogs pa las nad g-yog gis bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: nad pa de 'chi ba'i phyir rjes su bsgrub pa dug za ba dang thag pas 'ching ba dang / mtshon 'byin pa la sogs pa las nad g-yog gis bzlog par bya'o //
translated: If the attendant is following the patient in order to kill him, by ingesting poison, hanging, stabbing, etc., the attendant should be stopped by the patient.

original: rdzas kyi phyir gzhan shi bar 'dod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa'i rdzas thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can gzhan 'chi bar mngon bar dga' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rdzas kyi phyir gzhan shi bar 'dod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa'i rdzas thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can gzhan 'chi bar mngon bar dga' bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not wish for the death of another for the sake of material gain.

original: bya ba ma yin pa byed pa la sems kyis rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa byed pa la sems kyis rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not rejoice in the mind at the doing of what should not be done.

original: bya ba ma yin pa mngal na gnas pa rlugs par bya ba la sogs pa'i byed pa ni bya ba ma yin pa ste bya ba ma yin pa byed pa de la sems kyis rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa mngal na gnas pa rlugs par bya ba la sogs pa'i byed pa ni bya ba ma yin pa ste bya ba ma yin pa byed pa de la sems kyis rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o //
translated: The doing of what should not be done is the doing of what is not to be done, such as the abortion of a fetus. One should not rejoice in the mind at that doing of what should not be done.

original: lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni sems yin pa'i phyir de bkag pas lus dang ngag kyang bkag par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni sems yin pa'i phyir de bkag pas lus dang ngag kyang bkag par grub pa yin no //
translated: Since the mind is the forerunner of the engagement of body and speech, it is established that by its prohibition, the engagement of body and speech is also prohibited.

original: de ltar na 'dir tshig gi don 'di 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir tshig gi don 'di 'byung ste /
translated: Thus, the meaning of the words here is as follows.

original: rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin pa mngal na gnas pa rlugs par bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'i dngos po de dag gzhan gyis da ltar dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i rjes su bsgrub pa la sogs pa la ri rang ba sems kyis
analyzed: rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin pa mngal na gnas pa rlugs par bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'i dngos po de dag gzhan gyis da ltar dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i rjes su bsgrub pa la sogs pa la ri rang ba sems kyis
translated: The monk should not do such things as rejoice in the act of killing a fetus, which is something that should not be done by a monk.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa tsam ste /üîΩlus dang ngag gis yi rang ba de yang @138a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa tsam ste / lus dang ngag gis yi rang ba de yang @138a * //
translated: This is merely an illustration.

original: dge slong gis mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dge slong gis mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The monk should not rejoice in such acts with his body or speech.üîΩThis is the meaning of the passage.üîΩSome texts state that this was said in reference to the monk Upasena:

original: gzhung kha cig las tshe dang ldan pa nye sde'i dbang du mdzad de gsungs pa nye sde khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa rlugs par byas pa bden nam /
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las tshe dang ldan pa nye sde'i dbang du mdzad de gsungs pa nye sde khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa rlugs par byas pa bden nam /
translated: ‚ÄúUpasena, is it true that you killed a fetus?‚Äù

original: btsun pa mad lags te /
analyzed: btsun pa mad lags te /
translated: ‚ÄúLord, it is true.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni bgyis so //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni bgyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case, you should rejoice in that act.‚Äù

original: bka' stsal pa /üîΩdge slong dag dge slong nye sde la ltung ba med de /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa / dge slong dag dge slong nye sde la ltung ba med de /
translated: The Buddha said:üîΩ‚ÄúMonks, the monk Upasena did not commit an offense.

original: dge slong gis mngal na gnas pa rlugs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis mngal na gnas pa rlugs par mi bya'o //
translated: Monks should not kill fetuses.‚Äù

original: dge slong gis mngal na gnas pa rlugs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dge slong gis mngal na gnas pa rlugs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te /
translated: If a fully ordained monk causes an abortion, he commits an offense entailing expulsion.

original: gzhan yang rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin pa ci yang rung ba thams cad bsdus te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin pa ci yang rung ba thams cad bsdus te /
translated: Moreover, all that is not to be done by one who has gone forth is included in this.

original: spyir mdo 'di byas so //
analyzed: spyir mdo 'di byas so //
translated: In general, this s≈´tra is the basis.

original: skabs 'byung ba smras nas /
